/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades painted in a variety of colors that add vibrancy to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting light on the scene below. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and dynamism of the city.
